entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-12
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Error "Index was outside the bounds of the array." when reading from dataset without AsNoTracking() #30764
    7.0.8

Updated

  • Scaffolding: Allow arbitrary SQL hint to be passed as parameter #31061
  • Plan for Entity Framework Core 8 (EF8) #29853
    Discussions
  • Cosmos: Is it possible to re-add the Discriminator constraint when using FromSqlRaw on specific set? #30997

PullRequests

Created

  • Update SDK to 8.0.100-preview.6.23312.4 #31067

Merged

  • Introduce Visit for IReadOnlyList<T> #31065
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #31054
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • Parse simple default constraint literals when scaffolding #30927
  • Better translation of predicate-less Any over JSON #31066

Updated

  • Support any expression type inside inline primitive collections #31046
  • Support customized reading and writing of JSON values #31021
  • [release/7.x] Disable trigger enumeration on Azure Synapse Analytics, where triggers are not supported #31036
    Servicing-consider, community-contribution, 7.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Microsoft.Data.Sqlite: Fix handling of queries with RETURNING clause #31013
    Servicing-consider
